item.description:
Did anyone else besides me see Paul Rudd, Parker Posey, and Danny DeVito in The Oh in Ohio? I have been a fan of Paul Rudd for a while now. He has more range than his comedies belie, but we will be seeing his comedic talents this time around.

Our Idiot Brother stars Paul Rudd, Elizabeth Banks, Zooey Deschanel, and Rashida Jones. I think all of these actors are great comedians, and I think every one of them has worked with Steve Carell at some point. Kevin Bacon may not be the only one who can play the six-degrees-of-separation game! And Paul Rudd is as likeable a performer as Steve Carell. We can't go wrong!

I will purchase my ticket at about 6:00 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby for about 15 minutes. Look for me and my bright red backpack. At about 6:15, I will move into the theater auditorium (can't miss the previews). You can find me there if you are late. The movie starts at 6:30 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me and my bright red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Our Idiot Brother (The Movie)
